question:
Union Finance Minister is the Chairman of:
  1. Monetary Policy Committee
  2. Tax Policy Council
  3. Tax Policy Research Unit (TPRU)
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: Tax Policy Research Unit (TPRU) comprises of officers from the Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) and Central Board of Excise and Customs (CBEC) as well as economists, statisticians, operational researchers, legal experts. The Tax Policy Research Unit is headed by an officer of the level of Chief Commissioner at functional level alternatively from CBDT and CBEC for a fixed tenure, who directly reports to Revenue Secretary. Tax Policy Council is chaired by the Union Finance Minister. The Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) is a committee of the central bank Reserve Bank of India, headed by its Governor.
